name: lib/tupelo.js
TupeloClient
description:
Represents a connection to a specific Tupelo wallet managed by a remote
Tupelo RPC server

name: walletServer
description: The URL ("host:port") of the RPC wallet server to connect to

name: walletCreds
description: The name and passphrase of the wallet to connect to

name: rpc
description: Back end Tupelo Wallet RPC service connection

name: generateKey
description: Generate a new chain tree ownership key pair.

name: listKeys
description: List the addresses of the keys associated with the connected wallet.

properties.name: keyAddrs
properties.description: Public key addresses associated with the connected wallet.

name: createChain
description: Create a new chain tree owned by the key at `keyAddr`.

params.name: keyAddr
params.description: Address of the key that owns the new chain tree.

properties.name: chainId
properties.description: The ID of the new chain tree

name: listChainIds
description: List the IDs of the chain trees associated with the connected wallet.

properties.name: chainIds
properties.description: Chain tree IDs associated with this wallet.

name: getTip
description:
Get the latest tip (as known by the Tupelo network signers) of the chain
tree with id `chainId`

params.name: chainId
params.description: The ID of the chain tree.

properties.name: tip
properties.description: The chain tree tip as known by the Tupelo signers

name: setData
description:
Store data on a chain tree with a transaction validated by the network's
notary group.

params.name: chainId
params.description: The ID of the chain tree to store the data on.

params.name: keyAddr
params.description: Address of the key that owns the chain tree.

params.name: path
params.description: '/' delimited path into the chain tree to store the data

params.name: value
params.description: The data to store.

properties.name: tip
properties.description: The chain tree tip after the transaction.

name: setOwner
description:
Add the keys specified by `newOwnerKeys` to the set of owners of the chain
tree with id `chainId` in a transaction, and register that transaction with
the notary group

params.name: chainId
params.description: The ID of the chain tree.

params.name: keyAddr
params.description: Address of a key that currently owns the chain tree.

params.name: newOwnerKeys
params.description: List of key addresses for the new owners

properties.name: tip
properties.description: The chain tree tip after the transaction.

name: establishCoin
description: Establish a new coin type associated with a chain tree.

params.name: chainId
params.description: The ID of the chain tree.

params.name: keyAddr
params.description: Address of a key that currently owns the chain tree.

params.name: coinName
params.description: Name of the new coin

params.name: maximum
params.description: Maximum number of coins of this type that can exist

properties.name: tip
properties.description: The chain tree tip after the transaction.

name: mintCoin
description:
Mint new coins of an already established coin type associated with a chain
tree.

params.name: chainId
params.description: The ID of the chain tree.

params.name: keyAddr
params.description: Address of a key that currently owns the chain tree.

params.name: coinName
params.description: Name of the coin type

params.name: amount
params.description: Number of coins to mint.

properties.name: tip
properties.description: The chain tree tip after the transaction.

name: connect
description: Connect to a Tupelo wallet managed by a remote Tupelo RPC server.

params.name: walletServer
params.description: "host:port" string of the RPC wallet server

params.name: walletCreds
params.description: Credentials for the connecting wallet

params.name: walletCreds.walletName
params.description: Wallet name

params.name: walletCreds.passPhrase
params.description: Wallet passphrase

name: ./README.md
package.json
